name: Captain Crack
description:
Captain Crack has smell a treasure deep down in a pit. Now he must jump into the abyss, stomp some monsters and survive if he wants to get that shiny treasure.

This is a fast paced, procedural, vertical drop game made for the game boy jam 5.

It was inspired by Downwell.

You can raise your score by going fast, stomping ennemies, getting combos and by keeping your hat on your head.

We hope you will enjoy it. =)

Graphism & Music: deozworld44 (aka Leo Ferrand)

Code & Game Design: Maxence Plou
